scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Next,TS,Go" "cd docker-ardua && yarn dev" "cd docker-socket && yarn dev" "cd docker-go && go run main.go"
scripts.dev1: concurrently "cd docker-ardua && next dev -p 3001" "cd docker-socket && ts-node server.ts" "cd docker-go && go run main.go"
scripts.dev2: cd docker-ardua && next dev -p 3001 & cd docker-socket && ts-node server.ts & cd docker-go && go run main.go
